body: Can we please not have mutable references in this API. Just pass in a `const Tensor&`, it's just as good (unless you're actually bonking in a new pointer value for Tensor, in which case just return the Tensor here!)
body_html: Can we please not have mutable references in this API. Just pass in a const Tensor&, it's just as good (unless you're actually bonking in a new pointer value for Tensor, in which case just return the Tensor here!)
body_text: Can we please not have mutable references in this API. Just pass in a const Tensor&, it's just as good (unless you're actually bonking in a new pointer value for Tensor, in which case just return the Tensor here!)
